Description:
BEACH HOUSE IN PERFECT POSITION
If you want to feel like you're always on holidays at a relaxed beach house, this is the place for you!
Situated only 500 meters from the Beach and General Store strip, this beach house is ready to move into! With an approximately 580sqm block, the opportunities are endless.
The open plan style gives lots of light throughout and comprises of 2 bedrooms, bathroom/laundry, kitchen/dining and lounge, with a gas pot belly style heater for those chilly evenings.
A patio at the front and sunroom at the back means there's plenty of space to enjoy those sunny afternoons. The property offers a carport and large garage, with the added bonus of solar panels and a completely fenced-in yard.
With this location and price, this is a must see property.
Inspection is a must. If you are unable to attend a scheduled "Open for Inspection ", please call to arrange a private viewing.
Insights: 24 Shenandoah Drive, Coronet Bay VIC 3984 was last sold in 2017 and 6 other 2 bedroom house in Coronet Bay have recently been sold.

Description:
BEACH HOME ONLY 30M TO SWIMMING BEACH
One of the best locations you will find, this holiday home sits a very short 30m to the safe and sandy swimming beach at Coronet Bay and close to the shop in a lovely quiet court. With lots of potential to renovate, extend, go up and get fantastic views of the bay or simply enjoy in this fantastic location! The neat and tidy home has two bedrooms, open plan living, kitchen with electric stove and near new fridge/freezer, undercover entertainment area, double carport and comes including furniture if you require. Only 1 house to the beach and with a path to the foreshore close by make this an exciting opportunity not to missed.

Description:
ENJOY YOUR HOME ENJOY THE BEACH
If you have been dreaming of a neat and tidy holiday home by the beach, you have found it! With bay views from the deck and about a 500m to a safe and sandy swimming beach, this home in Coronet Bay offers a very comfortable option for your holidays or a permanent home. You will find timber and floating floors, three generous bedrooms, a large luxurious bathroom with spa bath and separate shower, open plan living, a dining area and spacious living area off the kitchen with electric cooking and a reverse cycle air conditioner. The home has loads of light and sliding doors leading to the back deck and an upper balcony to relax and take in the views across the reserve to Westernport Bay. There is also a storage shed/workshop, a three car carport plus loads of off street parking. Ready to make your very own.

Description:
FRESHLY RENOVATED BEACH HOUSE WITH BAY VIEW
Be the first to live in this beautifully renovated home located beach side in Coronet Bay's premier location. The home presents as new and is ready to enjoy in style. Beach access from Kowloon Crescent leads to the safe family sandy swimming beach in under a minute. Situated on 602 m2, the property offers a garage plus off street parking for multiple vehicles when the family and friends converge for the holidays. Safely fenced, the yard is perfect for children and pets to play when you're not at the beach. A massive upstairs rumpus room leads to the full length deck facing Westernport and French Island with views you will never tire of.
A host of stunning features inside the home include:
• New ground level floor tiles, carpets, laminate flooring & splash backs
• Sparkling new kitchen cabinetry, bench tops, sinks & taps to kitchen, bathroom and laundry
• Stainless finish cooker / ceramic cook top & range hood
• Twin 5.6kW Fujitsu Reverse Cycle Split System A/C plus a wood heater upstairs
• 300L Hot Water Service with connections for optional solar heating
• Water saving toilet suite, shower and tap ware
• Freshly painted
• Upstairs rumpus insulated to walls and ceiling to minimise heat loss
• New stainless finish lockable window winders downstairs
• New stainless finish door hardware / deadlocks
• New stainless finish curtain rods and new window furnishings
• New LED light fittings
This beautiful property is open to view by appointment and via open for inspection times as notified.

Description:
COSY IMMACULATE HOME IN TH HEART OF CORONET BAY COMMUNITY
Set within a scenic outstanding coastal countryside, this charming property has comfortable & spacious open plan kitchen & living area. Featuring 3 bedrooms with wall to wall carpet, BIRs .Main Bedroom offers WIR & bathroom, along with high ceilings, split system & ceiling fan. Wood fire place,
The main bathroom is spacious & has a separate bath & shower, and there is a european style laundry.
The home offers a great deck at the rear of the property for all your entertaining needs.
This property is a must see if you are looking for a great beach life style that offers, low maintenance garden, great fishing and only 500 meters from the beach, walking tracks, close to main General Store.
Great family home or holiday home and even dynamic investment property.
A sea change worth a look.
If you are unable to attend a scheduled Open House, please phone for a private viewing.

Description:
Young/Secure 4 Bedroom, Bring the Boat, Caravan and Cars - Coronet Bay
As New 4 bedroom 2 bathroom home by Coldon Homes, situated on approx. 534m2 established block with impressive high clearance undercover parking for cars, boat and caravan. A separate formal lounge theatre room located at the front of the home teams up with a massive living, dining and family area at the rear. This area flows out to a covered alfresco area with decking at the rear of the home. Easy care floating floorboards throughout and easy care tiled floors to wet areas make for hassle free housework. There's a large modern kitchen, air-con, split system, dishwasher, roller shutters throughout and finished off with a tasteful colour palette. Would suit buyers seeking a finished home with no work to be done, ready to enjoy!
Coronet Bay has many features including it's very own swimming beach, boat ramp and foreshore.

Description:
INVESTMENT OPPORTUNITY BEACH HOUSE ON A GREAT BLOCK
A truly unique opportunity exists to secure this glorious property of 1373m (approx.). If you want to feel like you're always on holidays, a relaxed beach house that's situated only 600 meters from the Beach and General Store strip, where you can leave the car at home and stroll down to the Beach for a swim. Well here it is the opportunities are endless with this beach house, it offers loads of potential if you wanted to renovate or you may choose to build your dream home on this large block with possible bay views (STCA).The beach house offers open plane living area, three bedrooms, one bathroom, laundry, electric stove and gas stove, water tanks x 3 and largest being 10,000 gallons capacity, solar panels with great grid rebate. There is a large garage and a carport as well, veggie garden and a chicken pen too. A block this size and the location like this are very hard to come by in Coronet Bay.
Agent available 7 days a week.

Description:
PERFECT WEEKENDER /HOLIDAY INVESTMENT !
Buy now to enjoy Christmas holidays near a safe sandy swimming beach. This 3 bedroom home features open plan living with cosy kitchen and meals area, airconditioner, master bedroom with robes, carpet in all bedrooms, good size bathroom/laundry combined. The property has a spacious backyard, garden shed, carport and is fully fenced. This is a great get away without having to do loads of maintenance and upkeep, just enjoy relaxing. Stroll to shop, bbq area and beach.
Approx. 7 mins to local shops and cafes, wineries or visit Phillip Island approx.. 20mins. Easy commute to CBD with dual lane highway.

Description:
SPACIOUS HOME BY THE BEACH
This large weather board family home would make a great holiday home for one or two families as it is low maintenance yet spacious having four bedrooms, two bathrooms, two living areas, split system air conditioning, a large kitchen with stainless steel electric oven and gas cook top, stainless steel dishwasher, a very large wrap around deck for entertaining pr simply relaxing. Within walking distance to the friendly general store and swimming beach at Coronet Bay. Extras include 8 solar panels, beautiful polished timber floors, external blinds and carport. Priced to sell so make an appointment and secure your new holiday home now.

Description:
Excellent Block with Westernport and French Island Views
This beautiful block of land in the popular coastal township of Coronet Bay measuring 506 m2 offers wonderful rural views across the road and potential bay views once built on. Located just an easy stroll to the lovely and safe sandy swimming beaches at Cutty Sark Road and Norsemens Road, this block is the perfect choice for a family or holiday makers who enjoy coastal activities. Made road frontages to Agar and Shenandoah Drive, the block is fully fenced with a gate and some boundary trees have been established. Nothing to do but decide on a house plan and build. Owner has reduced the price for a quick sale so enquire without delay.

Description:
Coastal Village Charm with Westernport Views
This beautifully kept one owner, 3 bedroom home has been lovingly maintained and established with absolutely nothing to do except to turn the key and move your furniture in. The home enjoys fantastic Westernport sea views from the full length undercover decking which is deep enough to have a very large outdoor dining table and chairs with room left over. The 3 bedrooms are very generous in size and the master has a walk in robe plus en-suite whilst the 2nd and 3rd bedrooms have full height sliding mirror robes. The kitchen has masses of cupboard and bench space and the view from the window is stunning across the Bay. A fully fitted laundry and family bathroom also add to the amenity of the home. Stunning sandstone flooring is laid throughout the living areas while the bedrooms have carpeting. Outside, the property has a large garage with workshop and a roller door to lock away your cars or boats. There is a vehicle turning space within the property and loads of off street parking alongside the wonderful decking area of the home. Close to Coronet Bay's safe sandy swimming beach, this home will be an ideal permanent or holiday home, the choice is yours.

Description:
JUST BRING YOUR BATHERS & TOWEL !!!!
Immaculate FULLY FURNISHED split-level holiday home within strolling distance to a safe sandy swimming beach. Featuring -
* Wide entrance with timbers stairs leading to upstairs -
* Spacious open plan living, meals and kitchen area
* Glimpses of bay
* Sliding door to balcony offering privacy
* Split-system airconditioner
* Floating floors
* Downlights and tinted windows throughout
Downstairs -
* 3 good size bedrooms master with walk-in-robe other 2 with large BIRs
* Spacious family bathroom with full bath, separate shower
* Good size laundry
* Neutral tones throughout
This property is fully fenced with carport, garden shed, outdoor shower, bitumen driveway and also bitumen under split-level giving the opportunity to expand for extra space such as games/rumpus room. A 24 hour boat ramp/jetty is just 4 mins away, local shops and cafes approx.. 7 mins and Phillip Island and major shopping centre approx.. 20 mins. Easy commute to CBD with dual lane highway. Coronet Bay is a popular family beach. Secure now for your Christmas holidays.
We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable. However, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective purchasers are advised to carry out their own investigations. www.1stre.com.au

Description:
AFFORDABLE BEACH HOUSE
Located in a very neat pocket of Coronet Bay and very close to Norseman Road beach is this 2 bedroom cottage with single garage. The house has basic amenities and requires some love and attention to reach it's potential. An open plan lounge, dining and kitchen area with exposed beams overlooks the rear yard with sea views (these will go as the new estate at the rear progresses). Two bedrooms are carpeted and there is a central bathroom with corner shower, basin, bath and toilet. There is a rear timber deck plus undercover deck at the entry to the home. The home will benefit from a new roof and painting internally and offer the purchaser an affordable entry into the popular village of Coronet Bay where there is a safe and sandy swimming beach, boat ramp and walking track to nearby Corinella.

Description:
Beach Side Beauty - Sail Away
Beautifully presented home walking distance to the safe sandy swimming beach at Coronet Bay plus the foreshore parkland, bbq's and General Store. This 3 bedroom home has a well crafted quality open plan design with lovely neutral color tones throughout. There is a well appointed modern kitchen with gas hotplates and fan forced wall oven and a new Dishlex dishwasher. The home is heated and cooled with both a split system air conditioner with ceiling fans and a gas heater in the living area. The large and open plan dining and kitchen area is located at the rear of the home and leads out to the decked rear yard where you will catch bay views. The bathroom is very modern and features an enormous walk in shower. The 3 bedrooms are all large and offer BIR's and have plenty of natural light flooding in. This is an easy care updated property offering floating floors and tiles throughout plus down-lights and fans. There is an excellent hot water system in this care free property and extensive concrete to the driveway with heaps of room for multiple vehicles, boat and caravan. Outside the home boasts a fantastic outdoor entertainment decking area over two levels offering bay views. Owner will consider selling the home with current furniture for the right price.
Be quick for this home, call the agent now!

Description:
APPEALING COASTAL HOME WITH BAY VIEWS !!!
This very neat elevated home features open plan living with woodheater, split-system airconditioner, meals area and cosy kitchen, 3 bedrooms all with BIRs and WWC, and polished chipboard flooring throughout for easy maintenance.
Underneath is fully concreted which gives you potential to enlarge the dwelling or ideal for entertaining/ bbq area. There is 6 solar panels, space for 2 vehicles and a good size water tank. The property is fully fenced and has beautiful established gardens.
Sit out on the balcony and enjoy the peaceful outlook and bay views on offer. Walking distance to a safe sandy swimming beach and shop. Phillip Island and major shopping centre is only approx.. 25 mins and easy commute to CBD with dual lane highway.
This property is priced to sell.

Address: 31 Lorna Doone Drive Coronet Bay VIC 3984
Description:
COASTAL BUILDING BLOCK
SWIMMING BEACH!
Coastal residential block of about 530 sqm within walking distance of a safe and sandy swimming beach, shop, playground, coastal walks and bbq area. Only minutes to the kindergarten, school and VLline bus. Approx. 8 minutes away is a small township with great shops including chemist, bakery, cafes, newsagency, hairdresser etc. Take your friends and visit the local wineries or visit Phillip Island just 20 minutes away. Coronet Bay is a great getaway for those who want a safe beach, great relaxation and a comfortable drive just one and a quarter hours from Melbourne CBD.

Address: 55 Bass Horizon Promenade Coronet Bay VIC 3984
Description:
SIMPLY STUNNING BY THE SEA
Appreciate classic restorations, top quality finishes and finely manicured landscaped gardens? 55 Bass Horizon Promenade could be yours to call your own with the added advantage of being sold fully furnished or with vacant possession.
With a street appeal like no other, this stunning 3 bedroom cottage has been lovingly and thoughtfully renovated with comfort and practicality in mind. The beautiful hardwood floors, leadlight windows and high ceilings with gorgeous cornices enhance the cottage feel whilst still having the modern conveniences such as split system, ducted cooling, wood heater and dishwasher. Both bathrooms are brand new and have been tastefully done.
Front and rear verandahs provide magnificant vantage points to enjoy the sun and the ocean breeze no matter what time of day in all weather types. Your very own resort style private oasis is there for you to enjoy in amongst the palms, water features and remarkable boardwalk in what is deceivingly low maintenance. The oversized double garage keeping in style with the cottage has been quality built and provides masses of storage solutions. Other notable features include solar system, coloured paving, sprinkler systems, 3 water tanks.
